Name: Castaway - 1
Desc: In the dim space, a Construct known as Mori slowly awakens.
MainlineTips: Find a way out of the Otherworld

Name: Castaway - Fin
Desc: Guided by BN-02, Mori begins searching for an exit from this space.

Name: Foreign Lands - 1
Desc: After leaving the Otherworld, Mori arrives in a city in ruins.

Name: Foreign Lands - 2
Desc: The familiar scene puzzles Mori.
MainlineTips: Advance to the city's terminal area

Name: Foreign Lands - 3
Desc: The path to the terminal is blocked by the Red Tide. Through BN-02's scans, Mori pinpoints the location of the protective gear.
MainlineTips: Advance to the city's terminal area

Name: Foreign Lands - 4
Desc: Mori sets off for a nearby base to acquire protective gear.
MainlineTips: Go to the nearby base to get protective gear

Name: Foreign Lands - 5
Desc: The base is on lockdown. Mori provides cover for BN-02 to hack the entrance.

Name: Foreign Lands - 6
Desc: Upon entering the base, an unidentified colossal mechanoid suddenly attacks.
MainlineTips: Enter the base to get protective gear

Name: Foreign Lands - 7
Desc: After burying the hatchet, Mori and DL-427 cross the Red Tide area together.

Name: Foreign Lands - Fin
Desc: Bidding farewell to DL-427, Mori arrives at the terminal, waiting for BN-02 to gather data.

Name: Clean the Area I
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area II
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area III
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Seize - 1
Desc: After BN-02 is damaged, Mori heads to the repair area to fix it.
MainlineTips: Go to the repair area to fix BN-02

Name: Seize - 2
Desc: Mori and BN-02 head to a nearby high-energy facility for clues.
MainlineTips: Go to the repair area to fix BN-02

Name: Seize - 3
Desc: In the supply room, BN-02 discovers new clues.
MainlineTips: Go to the power supply room

Name: Seize - 4
Desc: With the core of the repair area located, Mori and BN-02 set off immediately.
MainlineTips: Go to the power supply room

Name: Seize - 5
Desc: Mori enters the core of the repair area. Dangers lurk everywhere.
MainlineTips: Go to the terminal in the repair area

Name: Seize - 6
Desc: Mori and BN-02 activate the elevator to the core's upper level.
MainlineTips: Go to the terminal in the repair area

Name: Seize - 7
Desc: Upon reaching the terminal in the repair area, BN-02 initiates data collection and self-repair.
MainlineTips: Gather data from the repair area terminal

Name: Seize - Fin
Desc: At the helipad, the area's leader intercepts Mori and BN-02, who are in the midst of hijacking a fighter.

Name: Clean the Area I
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area II
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area III
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Sanity - 1
Desc: After the battle, with the fighter's power depleted, Mori and BN-02 make an emergency landing on the wasteland by the Red Tide sea.

Name: Sanity - 2
Desc: In the wasteland, BN-02 scans and locates a nearby signal tower.

Name: Sanity - 3
Desc: At the signal tower, Mori rescues and befriends Ks-321. To glean intel on the Red Tide creatures, Mori decides to visit Ks-321's camp.

Name: Sanity - 4
Desc: Arriving at the mechanoid camp, a swarm of Red Tide creatures suddenly attacks, plunging the camp into crisis.

Name: Sanity - 5
Desc: Mori leaves the camp and arrives at the seaside. The Red Tide creatures are strangely scarce here. Mori is disturbed by the eerie atmosphere.
MainlineTips: Go to the terminal located in the Red Tide

Name: Sanity - Fin
Desc: With DL-427's cover, Mori and BN-02 break into the heart of the Red Tide.
MainlineTips: Go to the heart of the Red Tide

Name: Clean the Area I
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area II
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area III
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Wish - 1
Desc: With the help of Ks-321, the fighter is resupplied, and Mori and BN-02 embark on a journey to the sea base.

Name: Wish - 2
Desc: The base entrance is barricaded by a high-energy barrier. Through BN-02's scans, Mori locates a jamming device nearby.
MainlineTips: Find a way into the base

Name: Wish - 3
Desc: After groping their way into the base, BN-02's sudden silence unsettles Mori.

Name: Wish - 4
Desc: Upon reaching the terminal, Mori suddenly receives an emergency message from BN-02, and then loses consciousness.

Name: Wish - Fin
Desc: In the realm of consciousness, Mori defeats the remnants of past memories, and the scene collapses.

Name: Clean the Area I
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area II
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area III
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Final Chapter - 1
Desc: After defeating the data, Mori returns to reality, but BN-02...

Name: Final Chapter - 2
Desc: Freed from control, BN-02 aids Mori in defeating the base's boss. Using a UFO, Mori successfully lands on the Moon where the Center is located.
MainlineTips: Go to the Center on the Moon

Name: Final Chapter - Fin
Desc: With the Center in a collapsed state, Mori and BN-02 set off toward their final destination: the Center Core.

Name: Infinite Battlefront
Desc: Endless Loop

Name: Clean the Area I
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area II
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Clean the Area III
Desc: Achieve area objectives and receive corresponding rewards

Name: Wish - IF
Desc: Determined to return the Data Center, Mori makes her way back to the base terminal.
MainlineTips: Fix the interruption at the base

Name: Sanity - IF
Desc: Mori returns to where the Red Tide started, ready to return the Data Center.

Name: Seize - IF
Desc: Back in the factory area, Mori begins the repair work.

Name: Foreign Lands - IF
Desc: Return to where it all began.
